description: This warming and hearty casserole is perfect cold weather comfort food.
name: Pork, Cannellini Bean & Apple Casserole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large apple, peeled, cored and chopped
0.8 cup chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and sear the pork steaks on all sides, working in batches.
Place the onions, 5 sage leaves and the butterbeans in the slow cooker and place the sealed pork steaks on top.
Bring the chicken stock and cider to the boil in a small saucepan and pour over the pork mix. Cook on low for 6 hours, add the apple and cook for 1 hour, until the pork is completely tender.

Remove the pork from the slow cooker and set aside in a serving dish. Whisk the cornflour with a tablespoon of water and stir into the sauce along with the mustard. Cook for a couple of minutes, until thickened.
Pour the sauce and beans over the pork and serve.
